info.title: Crud Service
info.description: HTTP interface to perform CRUD operations on MongoDB collections defined in the API Console

get.description: The list can be filtered specifying the following parameters

parameters.description: Hexadecimal identifier of the document in the collection
parameters.name: _id

parameters.description: Additional query part to forward to MongoDB
parameters.name: _q

parameters.description: Return only the properties specified in a comma separated list
parameters.name: _p

parameters.description: Filter by \_\_STATE__, multiple states can be specified in OR by providing a comma separated list
parameters.name: _st

parameters.description: Limits the number of documents, max 200 elements, minimum 1
parameters.name: _l

parameters.description: Skip the specified number of documents
parameters.name: _sk

parameters.description: Sort by the specified property (Start with a "-" to invert the sort order)
parameters.name: _s

post.summary: Add a new item to the users collection

_id.description: Hexadecimal identifier of the document in the collection

delete.summary: Delete items from the users collection

parameters.description: Additional query part to forward to MongoDB
parameters.name: _q

parameters.description: Filter by \_\_STATE__, multiple states can be specified in OR by providing a comma separated list
parameters.name: _st

patch.summary: Update the items of the users collection that match the query

parameters.description: Hexadecimal identifier of the document in the collection
parameters.name: _id

parameters.description: Additional query part to forward to MongoDB
parameters.name: _q

parameters.description: Filter by \_\_STATE__, multiple states can be specified in OR by providing a comma separated list
parameters.name: _st

schema.description: the number of documents that were modified

200.description: the number of documents that were modified
